title: Dirty Pair: Lovely Angels yori Ai wo Komete
synopsis: Released direct to video in Japan after the original TV series was canceled, this OVA is actually the final two episodes of the TV series.
voices: ['Tonguu, Kyouko', 'Shimazu, Saeko', 'Makishima, Naoki', 'Tanaka, Hideyuki', 'Sawaki, Ikuya', 'Matsuoka, Fumio', 'Hiromori, Shingo', 'Saito, Sho']
staff: [['Amino, Tetsuro', ['Storyboard']], ['Nakahara, Meiko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nakazaki, Hideya', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Kise, Kazuchika', ['Key Animation']]]
